search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Teachworks (teachworks.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Teachworks can be found at [https://www.teachworks.com/pricing](https://www.teachworks.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Plans for Education Companies of All Sizes | Teachworks

extracted_content.content:
Plans for Education Companies of All Sizes | Teachworks
===============
   

By clicking **“Accept All Cookies”**, you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. View our [Privacy Policy](https://www.teachworks.com/privacy) for more information.

[Preferences](https://www.teachworks.com/pricing#)[Deny](https://www.teachworks.com/pricing#)[Accept](https://www.teachworks.com/pricing#)

Privacy Preference Center

When you visit websites, they may store or retrieve data in your browser. This storage is often necessary for the basic functionality of the website. The storage may be used for marketing, analytics, and personalization of the site, such as storing your preferences. Privacy is important to us, so you have the option of disabling certain types of storage that may not be necessary for the basic functioning of the website. Blocking categories may impact your experience on the website.

[Reject all cookies](https://www.teachworks.com/pricing#)[Allow all cookies](https://www.teachworks.com/pricing#)

Manage Consent Preferences by Category

Essential

**Always Active**

These items are required to enable basic website functionality.

Marketing

Essential

These items are used to deliver advertising that is more relevant to you and your interests. They may also be used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. Advertising networks usually place them with the website operator’s permission.

Personalization

Essential

These items allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your user name, language, or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features. For example, a website may provide you with local weather reports or traffic news by storing data about your current location.

Analytics

Essential

These items help the website operator understand how its website performs, how visitors interact with the site, and whether there may be technical issues. This storage type usually doesn’t collect information that identifies a visitor.

[Confirm my preferences and close](https://www.teachworks.com/pricing#)

[![Image 4: Teachworks logo - dark](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/60268ae1e3b131462e4b7982_tw-logo.svg)](https://www.teachworks.com/)

### Plan Calculator

Find the best plan for your company by completing the fields below for a typical **month**:

[Try it Free for 3 Weeks!](https://app.teachworks.com/accounts/register)[Have more than 3 students per lesson on average?](https://www.teachworks.com/pricing#)

Average Students per  
Lesson

Thank you! Your submission has been received!

Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.

 

Frequently asked questions.
---------------------------

[**Can I change my plan after subscribing?** ![Image 30: Decorative Chevron Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/601a133b7386741f6316092f_Chevron.svg)](https://www.teachworks.com/pricing#)

Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time.

[**How do I pay for my plan?** ![Image 31: Decorative Chevron Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/601a133b7386741f6316092f_Chevron.svg)](https://www.teachworks.com/pricing#)

A few days before your trial ends we'll send you an email inviting you to become a paying subscriber. To pay for your plan you can enter your credit card details on the subscription page in your account.

[**When is my credit card charged for my plan subscription?** ![Image 32: Decorative Chevron Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/601a133b7386741f6316092f_Chevron.svg)](https://www.teachworks.com/pricing#)

We bill your credit card after the end of each month based on your usage during the month. If you sign up part way through a month your first invoice will pro-rate the cost for the remaining time in the month.

[**What are the "student lessons" mentioned in the plan prices?** ![Image 33: Decorative Chevron Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/601a133b7386741f6316092f_Chevron.svg)](https://www.teachworks.com/pricing#)

The monthly subscription includes a fee based on the number of lessons in the month. Lessons are counted based on the number of students, so a lesson with 1 student is 1 student lesson, a lesson with 2 students is two student lessons, etc. This count excludes cancelled lessons.

[**Are there any setup or cancellation fees?** ![Image 34: Decorative Chevron Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/601a133b7386741f6316092f_Chevron.svg)](https://www.teachworks.com/pricing#)

No, there aren't any fees other than the monthly fee.

[**What if I want to cancel my account?** ![Image 35: Decorative Chevron Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/601a133b7386741f6316092f_Chevron.svg)](https://www.teachworks.com/pricing#)

Teachworks has no contracts so you can cancel your account at any time.

[**What currency is used for the subscription fees above?** ![Image 36: Decorative Chevron Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/601a133b7386741f6316092f_Chevron.svg)](https://www.teachworks.com/pricing#)

Subscription fees are charged in US Dollars.

[**What Is The Fair Usage Policy For Emails?** ![Image 37: Decorative Chevron Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/601a133b7386741f6316092f_Chevron.svg)](https://www.teachworks.com/pricing#)

Each of our plans include “Unlimited Emails”, however, a fair usage policy applies to bulk emails. Transactional emails have no limit.

Transactional emails include emails related to lessons, billing, payroll, package balances, cancellations etc. Teachworks allows your company to send as many transactional emails as needed, based on your level of activity (i.e. the number of lessons you schedule each month).

Bulk emails refer to marketing, promotional or other informational emails that are sent to recipients using our Email Add-on. If your company sends a high volume of these emails relative to your lessons per month, additional fees may apply.

We calculate fair usage as 1 bulk email per student lesson per month and there is no additional charge for this volume. For example, if you have 1,000 student lessons per month, you can send up to 1,000 bulk emails with now additional charge. Email volume above the fair usage limit will have a charge of $1 per 1,000 emails.

[![Image 38: Up chevron](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/6123a2bea3ad0d1ca938575d_up.svg)](https://www.teachworks.com/pricing#top)

The ultimate starting point for businesses wanting to excel online. Save hours from your build and easily take control of Surface as the base for something epic.

[Start Your Free Trial](https://app.teachworks.com/accounts/register)

[Take a Quick Tour](https://www.teachworks.com/features/overview)

NAVIGATION

[Scheduling](https://www.teachworks.com/features/calendar)[Communication](https://www.teachworks.com/features/communication)[Billing & Payroll](https://www.teachworks.com/features/billing)[Records & Analytics](https://www.teachworks.com/features/records)[Multiple Locations](https://www.teachworks.com/features/multiple-branches)[Integrations](https://www.teachworks.com/features/integrations)[Website Plugins Demo](https://www.teachworks.com/demo/welcome)

Resources

[Tutorials](https://www.teachworks.com/tutorials/all)[Getting Started Guide](https://www.teachworks.com/getting-started/introduction)[Knowledge Base](https://teachworks.zendesk.com/)[Teachworks Blog](https://blog.teachworks.com/)[Client Testimonials](https://www.teachworks.com/reviews)

SOLUTIONS

[Tutoring Centers](https://www.teachworks.com/tutoring-management-software)[Language Schools](https://www.teachworks.com/language-school-management-software)[Test Preparation](https://www.teachworks.com/test-preparation-school-management)[Music Schools](https://www.teachworks.com/music-school-management-software)[Driving Schools](https://www.teachworks.com/driving-school-management-software)[Teaching Business](https://www.teachworks.com/teaching-business-software)

Our Company

[About Us](https://www.teachworks.com/about)[Contact](https://www.teachworks.com/contact)[Careers](https://www.teachworks.com/careers)[Status Page](https://stats.uptimerobot.com/1DPnJf6AoL)[Associations](https://www.teachworks.com/association-partnerships)

Legal

[Privacy Policy](https://www.teachworks.com/privacy)[Terms & Conditions](https://www.teachworks.com/terms)

© Teachworks 2024  

[![Image 39: Facebook Logo Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/601a133b7386745afb16098a_001-facebook.svg)](http://www.facebook.com/teachworks)[![Image 40: Twitter Logo Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/6560fd69ca3e76bc29f72da9_x-icon-white.svg)](http://www.twitter.com/teachworks)

Teachworks plans are priced to match the level of business activity of all education companies. Plans can be upgraded or downgraded at any time. No long-term contracts.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes a base monthly fee plus a per-lesson fee. Additional fees may apply for exceeding fair usage limits on bulk emails.

additional_fees.fee_description: $1 per 1,000 emails exceeding fair usage limit

Frequently asked questions.
---------------------------

[**Can I change my plan after subscribing?** ![Image 30: Decorative Chevron Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/601a133b7386741f6316092f_Chevron.svg)](https://teachworks.com/pricing#)

Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time.

[**How do I pay for my plan?** ![Image 31: Decorative Chevron Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/601a133b7386741f6316092f_Chevron.svg)](https://teachworks.com/pricing#)

A few days before your trial ends we'll send you an email inviting you to become a paying subscriber. To pay for your plan you can enter your credit card details on the subscription page in your account.

[**When is my credit card charged for my plan subscription?** ![Image 32: Decorative Chevron Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/601a133b7386741f6316092f_Chevron.svg)](https://teachworks.com/pricing#)

We bill your credit card after the end of each month based on your usage during the month. If you sign up part way through a month your first invoice will pro-rate the cost for the remaining time in the month.

[**What are the "student lessons" mentioned in the plan prices?** ![Image 33: Decorative Chevron Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/601a133b7386741f6316092f_Chevron.svg)](https://teachworks.com/pricing#)

The monthly subscription includes a fee based on the number of lessons in the month. Lessons are counted based on the number of students, so a lesson with 1 student is 1 student lesson, a lesson with 2 students is two student lessons, etc. This count excludes cancelled lessons.

[**Are there any setup or cancellation fees?** ![Image 34: Decorative Chevron Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/601a133b7386741f6316092f_Chevron.svg)](https://teachworks.com/pricing#)

No, there aren't any fees other than the monthly fee.

[**What if I want to cancel my account?** ![Image 35: Decorative Chevron Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/601a133b7386741f6316092f_Chevron.svg)](https://teachworks.com/pricing#)

Teachworks has no contracts so you can cancel your account at any time.

[**What currency is used for the subscription fees above?** ![Image 36: Decorative Chevron Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/601a133b7386741f6316092f_Chevron.svg)](https://teachworks.com/pricing#)

Subscription fees are charged in US Dollars.

[**What Is The Fair Usage Policy For Emails?** ![Image 37: Decorative Chevron Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/601a133b7386741f6316092f_Chevron.svg)](https://teachworks.com/pricing#)

Each of our plans include “Unlimited Emails”, however, a fair usage policy applies to bulk emails. Transactional emails have no limit.

Transactional emails include emails related to lessons, billing, payroll, package balances, cancellations etc. Teachworks allows your company to send as many transactional emails as needed, based on your level of activity (i.e. the number of lessons you schedule each month).

Bulk emails refer to marketing, promotional or other informational emails that are sent to recipients using our Email Add-on. If your company sends a high volume of these emails relative to your lessons per month, additional fees may apply.

We calculate fair usage as 1 bulk email per student lesson per month and there is no additional charge for this volume. For example, if you have 1,000 student lessons per month, you can send up to 1,000 bulk emails with now additional charge. Email volume above the fair usage limit will have a charge of $1 per 1,000 emails.

[![Image 38: Up chevron](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/601a133a769fa8f8d45d95ba/6123a2bea3ad0d1ca938575d_up.svg)](https://teachworks.com/pricing#top)

The ultimate starting point for businesses wanting to excel online. Save hours from your build and easily take control of Surface as the base for something epic.
